name: Alchemist's Sleep
description: Area Effect, Status: Sleeping *Affects a 3x3 area *Enemy is incapable of movement or action. Base 50% chance of working -- Will modifies *Lasts for the next 3 turns of the caster or until the enemy takes damage Prithee sleep, prithee slumber. Summer's coming, only child. Wild wild child Seek the shade tree Wild wild child Willows shade thee... Only child, older child, Summer's over, summer's over.

name: Along an Icy Path
description: Area Effect, Friendly Fire, Cold vs. Fortitude, Debuff vs. Reflex *Affects a line (1x2) in front of caster *3-5 Cold Damage. Base 60% chance of doing full damage -- Fortitude modifies *-1 Movement. Base 50% chance of working -- Reflex modifies. Debuff lasts until enemy makes a successful Reflex save She went along an icy path Cut between her love and wrath Frozen woods on either side Footing faulty, width not wide.

name: And Meg, She Gave Them Succor
description: Area Effect, Healing *Affects a 3x3 area *Heals 5-8 HP And Meg would cry, "Come in, come in, Come in and drink this tea. Its blending is a mystery, Its taste is also mystery. What is memory? What is sweet memory? Warm your blood if it grows cold."

name: Ballad of the Frogs
description: Area Effect, Poison vs. Will, Debuff *Affects a 3x3 area *4-5 Poison Damage. Base 70% chance of doing full damage -- Will modifies *-4 Reflex -- Works automatically *Debuff lasts for three rounds Burst not, burst not, Belly-throated! Sing and sing, but burst not. Oh there's blood On the dim June highway! But burst not, burst not, belly-throated.

name: Ballad of the Jays
description: Area Effect, Cold vs. Fortitude, Debuff vs. Will *Affects a 3x3 area *4-5 Cold Damage. Base 75% chance of doing full damage -- Fortitude modifies *-4 Attack Bonus for 3 rounds. Base 55% chance of working -- Will modifies *Debuff lasts for three rounds Harsh, harsh cry Clash and crackling Chase the starling Jaybirds cackling.

name: Blast of Light
description: A blast of light launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 2d6 points of damage.

name: Bless
description: All allies receive a +1 to their BAB for 5 rounds per level of the caster.

name: Blood Fever
description: Area Effect, Friendly Fire, Fire vs. Fortitude *Affects a 3x3 area with caster in the center -- Caster will be injured! *3-5 Fire Damage. Base 65% chance of doing full damage -- Fortitude modifies His blood, his blood It left his veins, Burned symbols in the bed. His nurse could see them But couldn't read them; She let him fade -- Far better dead.

name: Bread and Butter
description: Single Target, Electricity, No Save *4 Electricity Damage -- Works automatically Bread and butter I would mutter If the void was winking. Mutter mutter Bread and butter Lo, the void is gaping.

name: Deep Roots
description: Self, Healing, Status: Immobility *Heals Knott 12 HP *Keeps Knott from moving – Lasts for his next 3 turns

name: Defy the Snake
description: Self, Healing, Buff *Heals 3 HP *+4 AC, Fortitude, Reflex, and Will for three rounds Hereby, hereby I these defy: Hex and harm Churchman's charm Hypocrisy And evil eye.

name: Defy the Snake II
description: Self, Healing, Buff *Heals 3 HP *+4 AC, Fortitude, Reflex, and Will for three rounds Hereby, hereby I these defy: Hex and harm Churchman's charm Hypocrisy And evil eye.

name: Fireball
description: A fireball launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d6 points of damage per caster level.

name: Forbidden Hex
description: Single Target, Magic, No Save *Unique hex -- Caster will be injured! *4 Magic Damage -- Works automatically

name: Heals 8 HP
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 8 hitpoints

name: Hex of the Bitter Root
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Bitter Root -- Caster will be injured! *1 Physical Damage *-50% Non-Physical Resistances (except Magic) -- Works automatically *-2 Reflex *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Black Blade
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Black Blade -- Caster will be injured! *1 Physical Damage *-4 AC -- Works automatically *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Bonfire
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Bonfire -- Caster will be injured! *1 Physical Damage *-2 AC *-2 Reflex *-2 Attack Bonus *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Casque
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Casque -- Caster will be injured! *1 Physical Damage *-6 Attack Bonus -- Works automatically *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Circle
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Circle -- Caster will be injured! *-1 Move -- Works automatically *1 Physical Damage *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Coming Storm
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Costs 1 HP to use -- Caster will be injured! *1 Physical Damage *-100% Electricity Resistance -- Works automatically *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Court
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Court -- Caster will be injured! *-50% Physical Resistance -- Works automatically *1 Physical Damage *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Dread Hunt
description: Single Target, Physical, Ongoing, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Dread Hunt -- Caster will be injured! *Ongoing 1 Physical Damage for seven rounds *1 Physical Damage "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Heath
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Heath -- Caster will be injured! *-4 Reflex -- Works automatically *1 Physical Damage *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Red Candle
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Red Candle -- Caster will be injured! *-4 Fortitude -- Works automatically *1 Physical Damage *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hex of the Tower
description: Single Target, Physical, Debuff, No Save *Unique hex for Witches of the Tower -- Caster will be injured! *-2 Attack Bonus *-50% Electricity Resistance *1 Physical Damage *Lasts for seven rounds "Prick my finger, little crow, Fly the pain unto my foe. Multiply in stormy skies Raise the murder Cry your cries."

name: Hold
description: Holds one target for 3 rounds

name: Home Through Call Hollow
description: Area Effect, Debuff, No Save *Affects a 7x7 area *-3 Attack Bonus, -3 Damage from weapon attacks -- Works automatically *Lasts for three rounds Don't you go there Bat and swallow Don't you go there In the night Something's wrong In cold Call Hollow Something's wrong And won't come right.

name: Ice Storm
description: An ice storm launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per caster level.

name: Knottweed
description: Area Effect, Poison, Status: Immobility *Affects a 3x3 area *2 Poison Damage -- Works automatically *Target cannot move for the caster's next two turns. Base 55% chance of working -- Reflex modifies

name: La Belle Dame Sans Merci
description: Area Effect, Debuff, No Save *Affects a 3x3 area *-100% Fire Resistance and Cold Resistance -- Works automatically *-8 Will, Reflex, Fortitude, and AC -- Works automatically *Lasts for 2 rounds "Kisses four? But I want more" -- So she said to me. I gave her five Just half-alive; Of these she took but three."

name: Leap of the Black Deer
description: Single Target, Buff, Status Effect Removal *+2 Movement for three rounds *Removes Paralysis, Immobility Charge into the understory Dark as night Tell the story. Tell it right. Take nothing back Make it black. End of night: Make it black.

name: Lock of Hare
description: Summon *Summons a very weak (2 HP) minion with -8 Attack Bonus who does 1-2 Physical Damage *Lasts for the next 4 turns of the caster or until destroyed Here is where there was a hare -- A hare of hair, my hair of hare. There is where that hare went bare And left you there, my hair of hare. Long I sought you, hair of hare. Here I brought you, hair of hare. Hare's true heir, I claim my share -- My lock of hair, my lock of hare.

name: Mage Armor
description: An invisible field of force surrounds the caster, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC for 20 rounds per level.

name: Mage Bolt
description: A magic bolt of energy launches from the casters side and automatically hits a target for 1d4+1 points of damage. Additional bolts are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five bolts at 9th level and beyond.

name: Magic Stone
description: Caster launches a small stone that automatically hits a target for 1d3+1 points of damage. Additional stones are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five stones at 9th level and beyond.

name: Masque of Seven Colors
description: Single Target, All Damage Types vs. All Defenses *1-2 Acid Damage. Base 35% chance of working -- Fortitude modifies *1-2 Poison Damage. Base 35% chance of working -- Fortitude modifies *1-2 Cold Damage. Base 35% chance of working -- Will modifies *1-2 Magic Damage. Base 35% chance of working -- Will modifies *1-2 Fire Damage. Base 35% chance of working -- Reflex modifies *1-2 Electricity Damage. Base 35% chance of working -- Reflex modifies *2 Physical Damage -- Works automatically Color, color, cover me Flesh is dull, so cover me Flesh droops down while color flies; Color laughs and covers me.

name: Mass Minor Healing
description: Heals all party members for 8 HP each.

name: Minor Arrow of Kleos
description: A magic bolt of energy launches from the casters side and automatically hits a target for 1d4+1 points of damage. Additional bolts are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five bolts at 9th level and beyond.

name: Minor Healing
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 8 hitpoints

name: Minor Regeneration
description: Places a minor regeneration effect on a PC that lasts for 4 rounds giving the PC 2 hit points of healing per round.

name: Moderate Healing
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 16 hitpoints

name: Mourning Dew
description: Allies, Healing *Affects a 3x3 area *Heals 3 HP In the clover, there she sings -- In the clover, underneath -- In the clover, with her wings -- Lover, lover, with her teeth.

name: Of Ways and Woods
description: Self, Buff *+5 Dexterity for two rounds Tread the paths the black deer tread, Track the screaming fox at night. Drink the draughts of secret springs Dread no shadow in the wood.

name: OLD Leap of the Black Deer
OLD Possum and the Virgin
description: "My crown is gone," the possum cried. "I still have mine," said she. "You can't fool me," the possum said, "It is a forgery." "All crowns are forged," the virgin laughed," "And purity is too. "But blood is not," the possum wept: His head was split in two." HIGHLIGHTS *Summons a weak minion for 2 rounds DETAILS Summoned Possum HP: 1/6 SP: 0/0 Reflex/Will/Fortitude: 4/4/4 AC: 13 Attack: +2 Damage: 1-8 Poison Damage

name: One Wyrd Trick
description: Area Effect, Debuff, No Save *Affects a 5x5 area *-4 Will, -4 Reflex, -4 Fortitude, and -2 AC -- Works automatically *Lasts for three rounds Spittle, root, file, and twine Poppet, knife, and flower Children's rhyme, bitter wine Meager weft of power.

name: One Wyrd Trick (No Cost)
description: Area Effect, Debuff, No Save *Affects a 5x5 area *-4 Will, -4 Reflex, -4 Fortitude, and -4 AC -- Works automatically *Lasts for two rounds Spittle, root, file, and twine Poppet, knife, and flower Children's rhyme, bitter wine Meager weft of power.

name: Poison of Jhilyong
description: Consumable, Poison vs. Fortitude *30 Poison Damage. Base 70% chance of doing full damage -- Fortitude modifies

name: Precise Strike
description: The adventure concentrates on landing a grievous but not unsurpassable blow, doing 5 HP of Physical Damage to an enemy within 1 square.

name: Prithee Sleep, Prithee Slumber
description: Area Effect, Status: Sleeping *Affects a 3x3 area *Enemy is incapable of movement or action. Base 50% chance of working -- Will modifies *Lasts for the next 3 turns of the caster or until the enemy takes damage Prithee sleep, prithee slumber. Summer's coming, only child. Wild wild child Seek the shade tree Wild wild child Willows shade thee... Only child, older child, Summer's over, summer's over.

name: Red Fox in the Snow
description: Single Target, Cold vs. Fortitude, Fire vs. Will, Status: Paralysis *4 Cold Damage. Base 45% chance of doing full damage -- Fortitude modifies *3-5 Fire Damage. Base 55% chance of doing full damage -- Will modifies *Enemy is incapable of movement or action until the end of the caster’s next turn -- No save Red fox, black eye, white snowfall Hills blue, tail red, white sunlight White field, blue prints, red dot gone White white, blue-black, all alone.

name: Ripeness Is All
description: Self, Damage, SP Recovery *Regains 3 SP

name: Secrets of the Stolen Blade
description: Self, Buff *+3 Attack Bonus for three rounds Witch and knight together lay To the hilt they played With the sun the witch arose And carried off his blade.

name: Sleep
description: Puts creatures to sleep for 2 rounds.

name: Spider Bite Poison Minor
description: spider bite can cause poison of 1d3 for 3 rounds.

name: Substantial Grammar
description: An ally is summoned for x turns in this encounter.

name: Summon Ally Bear (Pc)
description: An ally is summoned for x turns in this encounter.

name: Summon Ally Spider (Crt)
description: An ally is summoned for x turns in this encounter.

name: Test the Elements
description: Area Effect, Debuff, No Save *Affects a 5x5 area *-50% Poison, Fire, Cold, Acid, and Electricity Resistance *Lasts for three rounds No gold but gold, no youth but youth No stone but stone, no truth but truth. Dissect and compound; distinguish, combine; Respect but compel; look and then find.

name: Test the Elements II
description: Single Target, Debuff, No Save *-50% Poison, Fire, Cold, Acid, and Electricity Resistance *Lasts for two rounds No gold but gold, no youth but youth No stone but stone, no truth but truth. Dissect and compound; distinguish, combine; Respect but compel; look and then find.

name: The Bristling of the Firecat
description: Summon, Fire vs. AC *Summons a strong (8 HP) minion with +6 Attack Bonus who does 5-7 Fire Damage *Lasts for the next 3 turns of the caster Nothing burns like fire at night In the sere it loves See it bristling red and white Kindling as it goes. Firecat, firecat! Pass by my house Instead burn down my foe's.

name: The Garden of Sick Thought
description: Area Effect, Friendly Fire, Ongoing Damage, Acid vs. Will and Fortitude *Affects a 3x3 area *2-4 Acid Damage. Base 80% chance of doing full damage -- Will modifies *2 Acid Damage for three rounds or until a successful Fortitude save. Base 65% chance of persisting -- Fortitude modifies You find the blighted rose within You touch its withered leaf You smell it, pinch it, taste it, keep And feed the soil beneath.

name: The Possum and the Virgin
description: Summon, Acid vs. AC *Summons a weak (4 HP) minion with +2 Attack Bonus who does 3-4 Acid Damage *Lasts for the next 3 turns of the caster or until destroyed "My crown is gone," the possum cried. "I still have mine," said she. "You can't fool me," the possum said, "It is a forgery." "All crowns are forged," the virgin laughed, "And purity is too." "But blood is not," the possum wept: His head was split in two.

name: The Storm-Blasted Heath
description: Area Effect, Friendly Fire, Electricity vs. Reflex, Cold vs. Fortitude *Affects a 5x5 area *4 Electricity Damage. Base 40% chance of working -- Reflex modifies *3 Cold Damage. Base 40% chance of doing full damage -- Fortitude modifies Bring me closer to the cloudbank's heart -- The darkest part, the darkest part. I am luckless, born to perish, But the thunder I can cherish.

name: The Sweets of Faerylond
description: Area Effect, Friendly Fire, Healing, Debuff *Affects a 5x5 area *Heals 3-4 HP *-4 Will -- Works automatically *-50% Poison Resistance -- Works automatically *Debuff lasts until the end of the caster's next turn Marzipan and honeyed claw, Purple juice in luscious cheeks Root of sugar, lemon jaw, Syrup's blood on candied sheaf.

name: Trefoil's Rime
description: Summon, Poison vs. AC, Healing *Summons a weak (4 HP) minion with +0 Attack Bonus who does 1-4 Poison Damage and can heal allies 3 HP *Lasts for the next 3 turns of the caster In the clover there she sings In the clover underneath Lover lover, with her wings Lover lover, with her teeth.

name: Unstable Rind
description: Area Effect, Friendly Fire, Fire vs. Reflex *Affects a 5x5 area with Knott in the center -- Knott will be injured! *4-7 Fire Damage. Base 60% chance of doing full damage -- Reflex modifies

name: Wallop
description: Single Target, Normal, Status: Immobility *5-9 Physical Damage -- Works automatically *Target cannot move. Base 55% chance of working -- Reflex modifies *Debuff lasts for Knott's next 2 turns

name: Wayfarer's Song
description: Healing *Heals 8-15 HP I am going on a journey in my mind, To the path of contemplation I'm inclined. And there is no use in numbering the things that I might find: I am going on a journey in my mind. And I leave the tiny kingdom far behind. As I make my way a silver thread unwinds: It is only there to mark the path and not thy foot to bind When you follow on the journey in your mind.

name: Web
description: Fills a 3x3 square area with sticky spiderweds.

name: Wild Daughter's Valediction
description: Single Target, Debuff, No Save *-8 AC for two rounds -- Works automatically “Up and down and round the glade We men will chase the beast. Chary, chary, gentle maid, Sit by and wait to feast." “No no,” said she, “I will not wait On gallants’ dull disport. I’ll ride a stag Grow old a hag And never return to court.”
